name: example
description: Collection of visualization tools and UI for the WeaveJS project.

scripts.babel: mkdirp bin/js && babel bin/es6/weave-app.js --out-file bin/js/weave-app.js --source-maps inline
scripts.build: cd .. && node run-ts build weave-app && cd WeaveApp
scripts.copy: cd .. && node run-ts copy && cd WeaveApp
scripts.compile-libs: mkdirp bin/js && npm run compile-librefs && tsc -p tsconfig-libs.json && babel bin/es6/libs.js --out-file bin/js/libs.js -s
scripts.compile-refs: cd .. && node run-ts main-import-tool -d WeaveApp/src/weavejs/ -f WeaveApp/src/_references.ts && cd WeaveApp
scripts.compile-librefs: cd .. && node run-ts main-import-tool -d WeaveApp/typings/ -f WeaveApp/src/_lib-references.ts && cd WeaveApp
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run copy-typings && npm run compile-librefs && npm run compile-refs && npm run compile-libs && tsc && npm run babel && npm run build && npm run browserify && npm run copy

author: WeaveTeam <devteam@iweave.com>
